name: Short Film
description: A brief film, typically under 30 minutes, that tells a complete story in a condensed format. Perfect for showcasing specific moments, concepts, or experimental ideas.

name: Feature Film
description: A full-length movie, typically 90-180 minutes, that provides comprehensive character development and complex storytelling. The standard format for theatrical releases.

name: Series Episode
description: An individual episode within a larger series or show, typically 20-60 minutes. Part of an ongoing narrative with recurring characters and themes.

name: Micro Film
description: An extremely short film, typically under 5 minutes, that captures a single moment, emotion, or concept. Often used for social media or experimental storytelling.

name: Documentary Short
description: A brief documentary film, typically 10-30 minutes, that explores a specific topic, person, or event in a focused, informative format.

name: Music Video
description: A short film that accompanies a musical piece, typically 3-6 minutes, combining visual storytelling with musical performance or narrative.

name: Commercial/Advertisement
description: A brief promotional film, typically 15-60 seconds, designed to advertise a product, service, or brand through compelling visual storytelling.

name: Web Series Episode
description: An episode designed for online distribution, typically 5-20 minutes, optimized for digital platforms and social media consumption.
